description: A river of the Argive plain, emptying into the Argolic Gulf: the modern Erasinos/Kephalari.

properties.title: OSM Location of the modern Erasinos/Keaphari

history.comment: cleaned up references; added ToposText reference; added iDAI.gazetteer and Wikidata references provided by bkiesling; added MANTO reference provided by MANTO team; added New Pauly
summary; added OSM Location (supersedes baseline gridsquare); connection to Argive Plain
replacing the abbreviation fl. with (river) to bring titles into conformance with Editorial Guidelines
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade
